chatbot.title: Alkemio Help
chatbot.subtitle: Ask your question to search through our documentation or browse it directly
chatbot.intro: Hi, this is Alkemioâ€™s automated guidance chat. It can provide you with answers based on Alkemioâ€™s documentation. What are you looking for?

infoDialog.title: Alkemio Help
infoDialog.content:
The Alkemio guidance chat is an advanced search module that helps you by automatically generating an answer to your question based on Alkemioâ€™s documentation. There are no people on the other side of the screen ;-). If you want to reach someone from the Alkemio team, please use the contact button below.
Answers (and sources) returned here are based on content from the Alkemio help center. The interaction is with a widely used online generative AI engine, which is able to interpret your question and provide guidance as to the most relevant help. There is no user data involved, and interaction with the search engine cannot be linked to individual users.

feedback.tooltip: This message has been automatically generated based on Alkemioâ€™s documentation. Your feedback is highly relevant to us!

references.title: New user? Visit our Getting Started pages!
Find your answers in the Help Center or FAQ

2.title: We have exciting news, a new release full of interesting functionalities is out!
2.content:
Exciting news! We've refreshed the main navigation of the platform to let the focus be on your community. Alkemio as a brand is now less visible, taking the role of "powering" your Space. This big and important change also allowed us to simplify the user navigation. So less buttons to distract you from your work inside your Space.

The new layout is as follows:
  • Menu: besides your personal profile and settings, you will now find a menu that includes all the jobs you can do on the platform outside of your Space
  • Navigation: in the top left, you will find the icons of the home page, Space, or Challenge to navigate back
  • Search: as users were often confused by the two search options (in the Space or the entire platform), we have combined them into one search function with the option to filter
We hope this release will bring you one step closer to efficient collaboration! **[Click here](https://alkem-25488729.hs-sites-eu1.com/alkemio-release-2023-11-01)** to read all about the latest changes.

1.title: We have exciting news, a new release full of interesting functionalities is out!
1.content:
After a big refresh of the lay-out and functionalities of the Space, it was time to dive into the Challenges & Opportunities and make some updates.

They are:
  • A more prominent role for the innovation flow that will guide your Challenge or Opportunity.
  • Now you can easily invite both Alkemio users as well as external people to "my" Space.


Among others! **[Click here](https://alkem-25488729.hs-sites-eu1.com/alkemio-release-2023-07-20)** to read all about the latest changes.

cookie.consent: By clicking "Accept All Cookies", you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation and analyze site usage.
cookie.settings: When visiting a website, information can be stored on your browser in the form of cookies. This information can be about you, your preferences and your device. Mostly, this information is used to make the website work as good as possible. Some websites use it for marketing purposes. As Alkemio does not allow any advertisement on its website, we only distinguish two types of cookies.
cookie.technical: Technically necessary cookies: enable you to navigate and use the basis functions and to store preferences.
cookie.analysis: Analysis cookies: enable us to determine how visitors interact with our services in order to improve user experience.

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.public: Public: this space and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a member.
visibility.private: Private: this space is visible for everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible for members.

membership.title: Membership
membership.noApplicationRequired: No Application required: all Alkemio users can directly join, without you having to review their application. Others will first have to create an Alkemio account, but can then also join this Space directly.
membership.applicationRequired: Application required: if people want to become a member, they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see Community tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitationOnly: Invitation only: users can only become a member after youâ€™ve invited them (which you can do from the Community tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host organization: allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.

memberActions.title: Member Actions
memberActions.createBlocks: Create Blocks: allow members to create blocks for collaboration tools & posts. If you deactivate this, members will still be able to contribute to existing posts and calls, but will not be able to create new blocks.
memberActions.createChallenges: Create Challenges: allow members to create Challenges in this Space. If you deactivate this, you can still create Challenges yourself and add other people as an admin inside the Challenge.

application.subheader: Please fill out the questions below, which together with your profile will be sent to the relevant party.
application.finish: Thank you for completing your application for

dashboard.hostTooltip: The host is the organization responsible for the creation of the Space.
dashboard.hostContact: The hosts are responsible for the content of the Space. Any questions or comments, please reach out.

challenges.no-data: No challenges available for this Space
challenges.description: Here you can explore the Challenges hosted in this Space. Filter by key words to show just the topics you care about.

opportunities.description: Here you can explore the Opportunities that have been identified for making progress on the Challenge. Filter by key words to show just the topics you care about.

community.description: Here you can explore the Community. See the Users that are contributing, as well as updates that have been shared by the leads.

agreements.description:
Agreements are the formation of concrete next steps to be taken. This new functionality will be available soon.

Ideas, suggestions? Please reach out!

leading-organizations.title: Leading organizations ({{count}})
leading-organizations.help-text: Shows different organizations, including the role you have
leading-organizations.no-data: No organization is leading at this time

member-organizations.no-data: No organization is contributing at this time

space-host.title: Facilitating organization
space-host.help-text: The Organization that is facilitating this Space.

members.help-text: Shows members is this community, including the role they have

whiteboard.subheader: Create your custom visualization and share it with others.
whiteboard.no-whiteboards: No whiteboards have been created yet. Be the first to add one.

state.checkedout: Someone else is currently editing this Whiteboard

delete.confirmation-text: Are you sure you want to delete this whiteboard? The action is irreversible.

steps.naming: Define a suitable name for your whiteboard. What will your whiteboard capture?
steps.templating: Choose from the list of templates if you want to use it as a blueprint for your whiteboard.
steps.completing: The whiteboard will be created with the following parameters

create-dialog.no-template-selected: To see a preview of the template please select one.

template.no-templates: There are no templates defined here yet. Be the first to add one.
template.how-to: To create a template create a new whiteboard or use an existing one and save it as a template.

space.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this Space can be used in every Challenge and Opportunity that this Space hosts.

challenge.templatesSubheader: The templates defined in this Challenge can be used in every Opportunity that is in the scope of this Challenge.

whiteboardDisconnected.title: Whiteboard connection lost
whiteboardDisconnected.message: Apologies for the inconvenience! The whiteboard isn't available for editing right now, possibly due to a network issue or loss of access. Please try closing and reopening the whiteboard or refreshing the page. If the issue persists, reach out to your Space administrator for assistance.
whiteboardDisconnected.lastSaved: The content of this whiteboard was last saved {{lastSaved}}.

login.title: Sign in to Alkemio
login.register: Donâ€™t have an Alkemio account yet? <signup>Click here to sign up.</signup>

about.title: Reimagining collaboration
about.description: Alkemio puts the Challenges central, each Challenge providing a central, neutral place for collaboration.

error.title: Ooops!
error.line2: Please check that your server ({{graphQLEndpoint}}) is available, and reload the page.
error.line3: If the error persists please contact support.

four-ou-four.title: Something went wrong...
four-ou-four.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for either doesn't exist or has been moved, or you don't have the rights to access it. This may happen because you aren't a member of the community yet or are not signed in. Don't worry, our team is there to help!

links.faq: Have a look in our FAQ and documentation to find what you are looking for, or contact the team.

registration.header: Create an account to start using Alkemio
registration.introduction:
Welcome at Alkemio! Alkemio makes it easy to manage Challenges and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. Challenges take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.
registration.terms: I accept the <terms>Terms of Use</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy>.

accept-terms.introduction:
Alkemio makes it easy to manage Challenges and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. Challenges take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.
accept-terms.tooltip: Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue

registration-success.header: Hi, thank you for signing up!

verification-success.header: Thank you for verifying your email address!
verification-success.subheader: Your profile is now fully activated on the platform. Enjoy!
verification-success.message: Please do consider filling out all posts of your profile. It helps with both applying to join communities and with others being able to connect with you.

message.initial: Please enter your email address below to receive a recovery code that will allow to reset your password.

verification.message: To receive a new verification email, please enter your email address below.

verification-required.message:
You are nearly there... One last step is to verify your email.
Please check your inbox for an email with instructions.

If you have not received an email, click on this link to send again.

communities.title: Communities
communities.help: Communities the user is a part of

associated-organizations.title: Associated Organizations
associated-organizations.help: Organizations who the user is related to

verifiable-credentials.title: Verifiable Credentials
verifiable-credentials.help: Credentials that the user holds issued by trusted parties

your-credentials.title: My Verifiable Credentials
your-credentials.description: Alkemio caches your verifiable credentials in your cloud hosted wallet. The credentials you share will grant you privileges in communities across the platform.

authentication-required.header: The page you are trying to reach requires you to be logged in.
authentication-required.subheader: Please sign-in or register to continue!

general.title: General
general.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding receiving messages

user-administration.title: Platform Administration
user-administration.subtitle: This section is only visible to users that are a global admin on the platform

community-administration.title: Community administration
community-administration.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding the community administration

user-communication.title: Mentions and messaging
user-communication.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding mentions and direct messaging

organization-communication.title: Organization mentions and messaging
organization-communication.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding mentions and direct messaging to organizations you manage

forum.title: Forum
forum.subtitle: This section allows you to select your preferences regarding activities in the Forum

help-dialog.title: Looking for help?
help-dialog.text:
We want to help you successfully use the Alkemio platform, and to do so we want to make the process of using it and interacting easier. This is how you can have an impact on the topics you care about.

Click on the icons below to find answers to your questions, contact the Alkemio team for support or just get started!
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Looking for tips & tricks? Find them in the blog posts here!

forum.title: Questions, suggestions, or feedback?
forum.subtitle: Get in touch with the Alkemio team or other users of the platform!

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Please enter a new password within the next 15 minutes to complete your password reset.
messages.verification-flow-expired: The verification link has expired. Please request a fresh one by submitting your email once again.
messages.recovery-flow-expired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one by submitting your email once again.
messages.login-flow-account-exists: You're trying to sign in with a LinkedIn/Microsoft account, but the associated email address was already used before. Please sign in with this e-mail address and password or try to reset the password. If that doesn't work, please send an email to support@alkem.io.

dashboard-discussions-section.title: Discussions ({{count}})
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-create: No discussions available. Create a new discussion
dashboard-discussions-section.no-data-join: No discussions available. Please join the community to create a discussion

type.title: Post label
type.help-text: What type of information do you want to share?

postLocation.title: Post location
postLocation.label: Contributing to Callout
postLocation.reminder: Be careful changing the Posts location. Moving the Post to another Callout will make it disappear from the current Callout. This might make it difficult for people, including the person who created this Post, to retrieve it. Note that you can only move Posts within the same Space, Challenge or Opportunity.
postLocation.success: Successfully moved Post to the new Callout.
postLocation.error: Something went wrong when moving the Post, please try again.

delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this Post?

associates-view.sign-in: Please sign in to see the users that are associated with this organization.

whiteboard.text: Card banner showing a preview of {{displayName}} whiteboard
